channel.title: CVE Feed for NAVER -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NAVER -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-24071|2024-08-03T03:59:23.786Z -- naver -- naver%20whale%20browser
item.description: A Built-in extension in Whale browser before 3.12.129.46 allows attackers to compromise the rendering process which could lead to controlling browser internal APIs.

item.title: CVE-2022-24073|2024-08-03T03:59:23.677Z -- naver -- naver%20whale%20browser
item.description: The Web Request API in Whale browser before 3.12.129.18 allowed to deny access to the extension store or redirect to any URL when users access the store.

item.title: CVE-2022-24077|2024-08-03T03:59:23.920Z -- naver -- naver%20cloud%20explorer%20beta
item.description: Naver Cloud Explorer Beta allows the attacker to execute arbitrary code as System privilege via malicious DLL injection.

item.title: CVE-2022-24075|2024-08-03T03:59:23.602Z -- naver -- naver%20whale%20browser
item.description: Whale browser before 3.12.129.18 allowed extensions to replace JavaScript files of the HWP viewer website which could access to local HWP files. When the HWP files were opened, the replaced script could read the files.

item.title: CVE-2022-24074|2024-08-03T03:59:23.649Z -- naver -- naver%20whale%20browser
item.description: Whale Bridge, a default extension in Whale browser before 3.12.129.18, allowed to receive any SendMessage request from the content script itself that could lead to controlling Whale Bridge if the rendering process compromises.

item.title: CVE-2022-24072|2024-08-03T03:59:23.580Z -- naver -- naver%20whale%20browser
item.description: The devtools API in Whale browser before 3.12.129.18 allowed extension developers to inject arbitrary JavaScript into the extension store web page via devtools.inspectedWindow, leading to extensions downloading and uploading when users open the developer tool.

item.title: CVE-2024-40618|2024-08-02T04:33:11.796Z -- naver -- naver%20whale%20browser
item.description: Whale browser before 3.26.244.21 allows an attacker to execute malicious JavaScript due to improper sanitization when processing a built-in extension.

item.title: CVE-2024-28214|2024-07-15T00:27:54.327174Z -- naver -- ngrinder
item.description: nGrinder before 3.5.9 allows to set delay without limitation, which could be the cause of Denial of Service by remote attacker.

item.title: CVE-2024-28215|2024-07-15T00:27:54.327174Z -- naver -- ngrinder
item.description: nGrinder before 3.5.9 allows an attacker to create or update webhook configuration due to lack of access control, which could be the cause of information disclosure and limited Server-Side Request Forgery.

item.title: CVE-2024-28216|2024-07-15T00:27:54.327174Z -- naver -- ngrinder
item.description: nGrinder before 3.5.9 allows an attacker to obtain the results of webhook requests due to lack of access control, which could be the cause of information disclosure and limited Server-Side Request Forgery.

item.title: CVE-2024-28212|2024-07-15T00:27:54.327174Z -- naver -- ngrinder
item.description: nGrinder before 3.5.9 uses old version of SnakeYAML, which could allow remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via unsafe deserialization.

item.title: CVE-2024-28213|2024-07-15T00:27:54.327174Z -- naver -- ngrinder
item.description: nGrinder before 3.5.9 allows to accept serialized Java objects from unauthenticated users, which could allow remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via unsafe Java objects deserialization.

item.title: CVE-2024-28211|2024-07-15T00:27:54.327174Z -- naver -- ngrinder
item.description: nGrinder before 3.5.9 allows connection to malicious JMX/RMI server by default, which could be the cause of executing arbitrary code via RMI registry by remote attacker.

item.title: CVE-2024-40618|2024-07-11T01:24:41.321Z -- naver -- naver%20whale%20browser
item.description: Whale browser before 3.26.244.21 allows an attacker to execute malicious JavaScript due to improper sanitization when processing a built-in extension.

item.title: CVE-2024-28211|2024-03-07T05:43:46.244Z -- naver -- ngrinder
item.description: nGrinder before 3.5.9 allows connection to malicious JMX/RMI server by default, which could be the cause of executing arbitrary code via RMI registry by remote attacker.

item.title: CVE-2024-28216|2024-03-07T05:44:43.399Z -- naver -- ngrinder
item.description: nGrinder before 3.5.9 allows an attacker to obtain the results of webhook requests due to lack of access control, which could be the cause of information disclosure and limited Server-Side Request Forgery.

item.title: CVE-2024-28214|2024-03-07T05:44:25.800Z -- naver -- ngrinder
item.description: nGrinder before 3.5.9 allows to set delay without limitation, which could be the cause of Denial of Service by remote attacker.

item.title: CVE-2024-28215|2024-03-07T05:44:32.658Z -- naver -- ngrinder
item.description: nGrinder before 3.5.9 allows an attacker to create or update webhook configuration due to lack of access control, which could be the cause of information disclosure and limited Server-Side Request Forgery.

item.title: CVE-2024-28212|2024-03-07T05:44:05.045Z -- naver -- ngrinder
item.description: nGrinder before 3.5.9 uses old version of SnakeYAML, which could allow remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via unsafe deserialization.

item.description: nGrinder before 3.5.9 allows to accept serialized Java objects from unauthenticated users, which could allow remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via unsafe Java objects deserialization.

item.description: Whale browser before 3.26.244.21 allows an attacker to execute malicious JavaScript due to improper sanitization when processing a built-in extension.

item.description: nGrinder before 3.5.9 allows to accept serialized Java objects from unauthenticated users, which could allow remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via unsafe Java objects deserialization.

item.description: nGrinder before 3.5.9 allows an attacker to create or update webhook configuration due to lack of access control, which could be the cause of information disclosure and limited Server-Side Request Forgery.

item.description: nGrinder before 3.5.9 allows an attacker to obtain the results of webhook requests due to lack of access control, which could be the cause of information disclosure and limited Server-Side Request Forgery.

item.description: nGrinder before 3.5.9 allows to set delay without limitation, which could be the cause of Denial of Service by remote attacker.
